images.title: Affordable Housing Program - Boma Yangu
images.context: This image shows a rendering of affordable housing units under the Boma Yangu program, a government initiative to provide affordable housing in Kenya. The image is relevant to the story as it illustrates the government's efforts in addressing the housing crisis.
